text: Allah, yini bayu pathana, phale ta meghamalake sancalita kare; atahpara tini etake yemana icche akase chariye dena; pare etake khanda-bikhanda karena, phale apani dekhate pana setara madhya theke nirgata haya brstidhara; tarapara yakhana tini tamra bandadera madhye yadera kache icche eta paumche dena, takhana tara haya anandita
